name: The Sims Medieval

files.file1: N/A:Please select the Sims Medieval setup file

task.name: set_regedit
task.description: Setting version to xp for SimsMedievalLauncher...

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Sims Medieval setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Electronic Arts/The Sims Medieval/Game/Bin/TSM.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet20
    arch: win32
    description: Installing .Net 2.0
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    silent: true
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting version to xp for SimsMedievalLauncher...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\AppDefaults\SimsMedievalLauncher.exe
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: winxp
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting version to 7 for default...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: win7
- task:
    executable: file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  restore_gamma: true
wine:
  UseXVidMode: true
  version: tkg-oldnvidia-sims3-4.1-x86_64
